description: Describes the shard limits and usage for the account. If you update your account limits, the old limits might be returned for a few minutes. This operation has a limit of one transaction per second per account.

nested_items.name: OnDemandStreamCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of data streams with the on-demand capacity mode.

nested_items.name: OnDemandStreamCountLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of data streams with the on-demand capacity mode.
